review:
I am a new mom, and let me tell you babies require a lot. I have had to make quite a few adjustments. Much of the time it has been financially. I have had to decide against getting the necessities of life for ‚Äòme‚Äô. I had wish lists and loaded shopping carts on various websites, ‚ÄúWindow shopping‚Äù, and hoping. Remembering the words of Kevin Hart, ‚ÄúI would, but the way that my bank account is set up...‚Äù lol. Then when I desperately needed a pair of pants that fit after having the babies. I began checking online clearance. I was so discouraged, and about to skip the first family gathering with everyone in three years since my grandmother passed. She was the only one that could get us all to come together from across the nation. I was on the Fashion Nova site and was given QuadPay as an option of payment. I was instantly relieved. I began to see advertisements for other businesses. I felt totally liberated. A forth payment up front was a lot easier for me. The app and service is hassle free thank goodness. It notifies you of your next payment status and when your due. I have had four or so orders from two servicers. I plan to use a third/Apple in a couple weeks.

It‚Äôs been awesome, worry free, and hassle free so far. Thank you so much!!!!!
title: Whoot whoot, I love it!!!!!

review: I love being able to have the ability to purchase online things in payments without it going against your credit. However, I do not like the refund process and I think it should be revised. I purchased an order through a website & used Quadpay. The package said it was delivered but was never delivered (at least not to me). I filed a dispute for merchandise never received with the merchant, carrier, & my bank. I tried to with Quadpay but they told me they can‚Äôt stop the payments because they have to wait on the merchant to advise them to process a refund. However, I knew the merchant wasn‚Äôt going to do that because it shows as delivered in their system & the carriers. The merchant eventually came back to me and said they are closing my claim because it shows as delivered and quadpay will not process my refund. So I am just going to have to go through my bank. I feel like me going through my bank could have all been avoided if quadpay had additional refund options for those who do not receive their merchandise. I understand it‚Äôs a safety precaution for those people who do scam but for us people who are truly innocent and did not receive our merchandise, it is a bummer. I have to jump through hoops to get my money returned. I dont feel I should pay for products never received. Packages are mis-delivered and/or stolen unfortunately...overall good app & love the simplicity. Just wish there were additional refund options & not just up to the merchant....
title: It‚Äôs okay...

review: I‚Äôve completed and paid off one purchase so far and transaction and payments went smoothly. I‚Äôve recently used the app again for another purchase however I was being indecisive and was browsing the site and re-arranged 2 times before I finalized and completed the purchase. The 2 times I entered amount for purchase while debating went through and now my checking account has 3 separated pending transactions for payments. The first 2 that I was debating and the 3rd one I actually completed the purchase. The FAQs state the 2 will drop off however it makes me nervous and I‚Äôll have to follow up to ensure they reverse. I think your account shouldn‚Äôt be charged the 1st payment until you actually finalize the purchase instead of when you enter the estimated amount of the purchase. Also, you are provided a set limit of funds available with no options to request an increase. I understand this isn‚Äôt a credit card but I feel like if you‚Äôve completed payment of orders then you should have an option to request a small limit increase. Or perhaps it should automatically increase a little after every completed order payoff. Other then that it‚Äôs convenient and I appreciate being able to make purchases on payment without having my credit score impacted via credit card utilization percentages. I‚Äôll revise my review if the pending charges aren‚Äôt reversed and dropped off.
title: So far so good..

This is so helpful for us, as we are always looking for ways to improve our experience for all users. Keep on #QuadPaying!", 'modified': '2020-02-03T17:34:21Z'}
review:
Logged on to FashionNova to order my Fianc√©e a sexy red dress & sexy red lingerie for Valentine‚Äôs Day. Ready to check out, I noticed the QuadPay option of 4 breakdown payments and with a wedding in the near future, I‚Äôm trying to save/manage every penny! Not to mention the app was compatible with the SUPER50 promo(1/2 price sale) the website was offering. Half off + 4 payments + A card to add to my apple wallet = Highest Appreciation!!!
On a technical critique, I noticed being redirected from the original website into the QuadPay app, the usage was very choppy/lagging, not sure if its bugs in the latest version or if internet traffic from the FashionNova sale was causing a delay. However the slow interaction made it extremely difficult and highly frustrating to complete the purchase, especially since I personally didn‚Äôt understand the check out process of selecting QuadPay as the pay process (this redirected me back to the checkout screen multiple times and caused ‚Äúerrors‚Äù) vs the actual solution of removing my own debit card info and replacing it with the new Visa card info which is given to the user in the app. Please consider making a smoother checkout transition for new comers. Overall, outstanding app & online store selections, looking forward to using the Apple Pay feature in physical stores. Job Well Done.
title: 1st Experience

review:
I am a huge fan of all of these alternative method options (afterpay, sezzle & now quadpay) in today‚Äôs world, the primary consumer is burdened by overwhelming student loans and often times pays more towards that balance per month than they do for a mortgage or car payment, so it‚Äôs a relief to have options for large purchases. I like that quadpay has a vast variety of top retailers available to use their program with, but it does not come without a cost (hence the 4 stars) the only reason that QP didn‚Äôt get 5 stars is due to the $1 fee on each scheduled payment. Afterpay/sezzle does not do this, but they link directly to ones credit or debit card vs. quad pay which utilizes an interim unique credit card number specific to your account/transaction & QP has a lot more ‚Äúmainstream‚Äù retailers than its competitors, so I can see how the $1 would be justified but it does seem a bit steep. I‚Äôd recommend trying to get the retailers to foot some of that $1/scheduled payment as they will almost certainly see some incremental sales volume, as a direct result of being listed on QPs site, especially as QP grows in popularity. Even $.50/scheduled payment seems much more reasonable. Just a thought!
Either way- very efficient and effective, quick - easy to use and little information collected. Great job overall!
title: Easy & effective payment method

review: Hi, I ordered from Target. I‚Äôm glad you have everyday store chains to shop from. Cyber Monday sales I had to compare who had the best tablet deals. I have a 6 yr old tablet my 4 yr old granddaughter uses everyday. It‚Äôs getting to the end of it‚Äôs life. I want to watch something bigger than my iPhone sometimes. Mamaw don‚Äôt get to watch Roku channels or the news because some little one thinks the remote is hers lol. So I bought us each a tablet and a few other things. The tablets were such a good deal! I had to push copy the Pay with QuadPay button a few times. I think it said I already had a card registered. The last time I pushed and copied it went through smoothly.I think it was because I already had my bank debit card registered. I shop at Target a handful of times a year. It‚Äôs an hour away so I only have Walmart around here. It‚Äôs nice to see different things. The only bad thing is getting me out of the store lol! I stay at home most of the time. I know most everyone is on a budget. Christmas is coming. I know QuadPay is a great way to get the things you need if you have can‚Äôt pay a large lump sum up front. If your struggling give them a try! Thank you QuadPay and Merry Christmas!üéÑ‚òÉÔ∏èüéÖüèº
title: Easy to shop. Easy to checkout! Thank you!

review: When I saw the ads for this app honestly at first I was skeptical. Then when I was approved almost immediately for $200 limit just answering a handful of simple non invasive questions I was even more sketch. I needed a new PS4 controller and GameStop was an approved store. I was almost broke that week and thought I‚Äôd have to wait a whole couple weeks just to jump on the PS4. Well I got some trade ins together and landed in GameStop and the two employees were completely unaware of any program like QuadPay and made me feel really nervous that I was wasting my time. Finally after explaining what it was again they called another store to see what they said and they totally backed QuadPay and I up. Now neither myself nor the two seasonals had any experience with how it was gonna work or what to do. You just follow the instructions after they give you a total, get in your QuadPay app and select the store you are out and it will ask you to type in the total amount due. Seconds later it shows you yours amount due today then the other 3 installments. Never have I ever got to do the tap thing to pay using my phone but I did with this purchase and it absolutely worked like a dream. Great stuff, alright back to my gaming.
title: It‚Äôs so EZ...

review:
I‚Äôve spent around $1000 total this year through this app, so far, and have been enjoying its flexibility up until now. I tried to order through Sephora 5 days ago and kept receiving an error message after submitting the order - then quadpay charged me for my first payment of $48 - normally you can cancel a transaction however the app has very limited options and it wasn‚Äôt appearing. It‚Äôs been 5 days and I have only received automated responses and two times they sent the same response - proving you can‚Äôt talk to an actual person. Therefore no one is reading what I‚Äôm actually saying in my message. So now I am currently stuck with paying $200 for items that I will not be receiving as they were never properly ordered or processed through Sephora. I have recently received a message stating that I need to go through Sephora to resolve this however neither my beauty insider account or their info proves that an order was processed because of the error with payment  - and since quadpay does not have actual people responding to you - I don‚Äôt see this being resolved unless I cancel my card and claim fraudulent on their part because that‚Äôs what this is beginning to feel like. 

BEWARE THIS APP. If something goes wrong or there is a glitch on their part they will NOT help you - and keep your money! 

Check the better business bureaus website as there are many other people struggling with their complete lack of customer service!!
title: Fraudulent App

review:
I heard of Quad pay a little while back but I never used it because the stores I shop at weren‚Äôt apart of their affiliate program. I downloaded the app recently because it said shop at ANY store. Which is true. I purchased a $130 tool at a hardware store online and went and picked it up next morning after only paying first or 4 interest free payments!! I‚Äôm happy. Wife‚Äôs happy. Come to find out she‚Äôs not new to Quad pay. And this is how she buys her outfits online. 

The only problem so far is this, and it‚Äôs more of a problem for the developers to solve is that YOU HAVE TO HIT PURCHASE AT THE RIGHT DURING THE PURCHASE PROCESS IN THE SHOPPING CART!  If you fail to do so quad pay will prematurely hold first payment funds and the RETAILER will try to process full purchase amount.  It was kind of tricky because I wasn‚Äôt sure how it all worked. There‚Äôs no need to give your card number to retailer. Quad handles it. But you must hit pay at the right time. 

Good news is. The mistake was corrected quickly. The balanced held against my account was released almost immediately and I went back and tried my purchase again no problem. (Like is said this is more of a new user mistaken that could of been prevented by the developers.)
title: Credit card killer!

review: Quad pay is absolutely AWESOME!! They have literally been such a blessing to my family and I and have allowed us to have a bit of financial freedom to pay for EVERYTHING! I have been so stressed trying to figure out how to pay for bills, food and Christmas coming up. I accidentally came across Quadpay one night while I was in tears searching on Google on places that were like ‚Äúbuy now pay later‚Äù. I read the reviews, read what Quadpay was all about and gave it a chance. I signed up and was instantly approved for an extremely generous credit! Seriously, it was so easy to sign up, get verified and start using my Quadpay card! Y‚Äôall, I can‚Äôt stress enough how easy their entire process is and you can use it every store known to man. Because of Quadpay, I have been able to give my kids an amazing Christmas, buy things for my home I need and all on all with minimum payments. I know a lot of us are struggling right now and need a little help and a little hope. Quadpay is it and they sure are a blessing in a time of need. I am forever greatful and will always be a Quadpay lover üíó
title: Absolutely AWESOME!!

review: This app would be great if it worked the way it was intended to. I initially use QuadPay for a purchase with primitive and everything went great. I downloaded the app signed up for the card and was on the waiting list. While on the list I used QuadPay through primitive again with no issues. I was able to pay both off no problems. Once I was approved for the QuadPay card I had issues tried to make a purchase at Under Armour and the payment only processed for part of the purchase amount. I couldn‚Äôt get the QuadPay app to work so I called Under Armour and canceled the order. They said they will issue the refund. The 3 days Under Armour said it would take for the refund to issue passed and I got an email saying it was issued successfully. QuadPay hasn‚Äôt issued my refund for the initial payment, my card was taken away and I was put back on the waiting list. I tried to use the automated messaging system to solve the issue but that didn‚Äôt happen. I was prompted to send an email for further support, so I did. It has been almost a week with no response, or refund. Also the QuadPay app now says I‚Äôm denied the card and must try again In 30 days. This is unbelievable 4 payed off purchases through this company and one currently open, but they take the card and say I‚Äôm denied? I don‚Äôt get it. I really did like this company and the app the ability to use it anywhere is great, but now I don‚Äôt know if I will even try to use it again.
title: Poor service

review: The thing about QuadPay is your not paying interest the payment for whatever you are buying is literally just split in 4 payments every 2 weeks they put the money up front for your purchase but your basically paying back QuadPay if 4 payments. It‚Äôs easy just type which item you‚Äôd like to shop for and did I mention they have a lot of different stores, stores I didn‚Äôt even know about. What I normally do is go to the search page type in ‚Äúmakeup‚Äù so many stores with different prices from ulta and Sephora have cheaper prices with the same products. I would of never known without QuadPay. Did I mention every time you spend the amount of money you spend determines the amount you‚Äôll be preapproved for so if you spend 250, ounces it‚Äôs all paid up it will go into your pre approved for another purchase. This is a great tool for those trying to get multiple gifts for Christmas and don‚Äôt want to spend a lot of only have enough for some at once it‚Äôs perfect. Also awesome for moms I have a son and I‚Äôm always looking for different clothes and toys and this app has it all. Try it out you definitely won‚Äôt regret it. It‚Äôs worth it‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è
title: One of the best 4 way payments plan apps

review: QuadPay is actually the second app I‚Äôve used to make split payments on purchases. I have found that there are actually a number of these that I‚Äôd never heard of until now. Anyway, I do like this one better than the other one I had used because of the card you can use. Most of these programs have certain businesses they‚Äôre affiliated with that you can purchase from which can be limiting if the place you want to shop from isn‚Äôt on the list. I‚Äôm assuming that you need to make a purchase through an affiliated company and pay it off before they give you a card balance but once they do, you can request a certain amount (up to the amount they‚Äôll allow. Right now I have 200 I can spend) that you want to use for a purchase and they will create temporary credit card information that you can use anywhere that takes Visa or Amex. They charge a few dollars fee and then you just pay off your balance over the next six weeks like normal. I like to shop from some less mainstream shops so this is great. I was able to buy from YesStyle using my quadpay balance and now I‚Äôm super excited just thinking about the different places I want to buy from.
title: Pretty neat app

developerResponse: {'id': 12010835, 'body': "Hi there! We want to safely approve as many people as possible, but aren't always able to do so. Please email appreviews@quadpay.com and we'll be happy to review your account. Thanks!", 'modified': '2019-11-23T18:08:54Z'}
review:
READ BEFORE YOU SIGN UP!! Found this app and from the reviews and info supplied above it seemed like it could be a good thing to try, especially with the holidays around the corner. I downloaded and signed up with my personal info in the most recent version of the app. Even went so far as to add a payment method and awaited the ‚Äúyou‚Äôre account is ready to use now shop!‚Äù Like it exclaims above...simple...easy...shopping with payments. But, I received instead a message saying, ‚Äúdue to the popularity of the app, we can‚Äôt accept you currently, but keep an eye out and we‚Äôll send you an email when you can join...or feel free to try and retry in a month or so.‚Äù First reaction is ‚Äúwhaaaa? ok‚Äù then more like ‚Äúokay so you enticed me to simply sign up and get started today‚Äù only to slap me with a ‚Äúhey! Isn‚Äôt it great?! were super popular at the moment so we can‚Äôt have you in the club but thanks for signing up with your details...maybe soon we‚Äôll have a spot..maybe a month. Up to you to check back. Yay us!‚Äù 

Guys...come on. I get the trending join or waitlist for early access marketing and even the classic old Facebook invite only tactics that some are still clinging to..but, not disclosing anything in the details above saying something about it? Even the same semi pompous gloat message would do. Well hopefully this will reach a few would be applicants ahead of time to save them the dumbfounded expression I had moments ago.
title: Guys...Come on...

review:
I was buying some new shoes online and when I went to checkout I say QuadPay as an option. Click on it to see what it was and when I read that it splits your payment into four equal installments (interest free). I said sure I‚Äôll give this a try. So right off the bat QuadPay pays for your purchase in full and you pay QuadPay the first installment. Got my new shoes in the mail a couple days later and paid off the installments when scheduled. I believe they‚Äôre every two weeks but I can‚Äôt remember. The nice part is you also don‚Äôt have to wait for the scheduled date to pay. So if by the second payment you want to pay the rest off then you can. QuadPay works with returns too, now I haven‚Äôt done that but I believe they get the full refund and then refund you whatever you paid so far. 
Last thing, this app allows you to use QuadPay anywhere, you just open the app and type in the website you want to go to and at check out there‚Äôs a banner at the bottom of the app that says ‚Äúpay with QuadPay‚Äù. You just click that and type in how much everything is plus tax and shipping. And then QuadPay generates a Visa card number and everything for you.

review: So I downloaded this app and used it when they first got started. So here was my experience I went online to purchase some Ugg‚Äôs that were about $250 I went directly to the UGG site upon checkout it asked if I wanted to use quad pay at the time I knew nothing about the app but what I did know was that I would be able  to break my payments up into 4 installments. title: DUHHH The BEST APP EVER

review: I first used QuadPay when I was going to order some Silicon rings for my husband and I on Enso Rings and it gave me the option to do installment payments. I did have doubts though. Like if my order would wait to ship until after the installments where all made and how well QuadPay communicated with the merchant but my order came so quickly and I had no issues. Not to mention that if QuadPay hadn‚Äôt sent me reminders through text and email a few days before each payment, I wouldn‚Äôt have even noticed they charged my account! It‚Äôs wonderful. I‚Äôve placed two different orders since then. I did notice that if I spend too long on a website before putting in the payment information, I get an error message when I check out. That‚Äôs the only thing I could complain about but it‚Äôs really such a small inconvenience compared to how great this app is overall. It‚Äôs like a much safer credit card with no interest. review:
So I‚Äôve been using QuadPay for a couple years now. I‚Äôve never had problems with QuadPay until just recently, customer service has been giving me the run around. The app was always easy to navigate and very convenient UNTIL I was locked out of my account for no apparent reason. I always pay my installments on time and everything. They locked me out of my account and I needed to access it so I could update my payment method. 
I was originally using a different debit card for a past purchase but I‚Äôve recently switched to a different bank that I now use as my primary bank account. All I needed was access to my account to switch my cards. The previous card I used had little to no funds available because I stopped using that account HOWEVER QuadPay CONTINUED to withdraw my installments and every transaction I was charged $30 overdraft fee from my bank. 
I have been emailing and chatting back and forth with customer service for 1 month now in regards to this issue. They will not give me access to my account to change my payment methods and I‚Äôm still being charged. They have done NOTHING and they keep lying saying they will forward my info to their imaginary ‚Äúinternal team‚Äù ( THAT DOES NOT EXIST ) I hate this app now and once I get my account resolved I‚Äôll never use them again.

review:
I got QuadPay a few days ago and was excited to try it out. I followed the directions and linked my debit card and set everything up. Ready to do some shopping I had an available balance to use of $250. After picking my wife out a Yeti cup for $37...there‚Äôs a minimum $35 order, I went through everything as directed and placed the order using the virtual one time visa number they supplied. It didn‚Äôt go through. It would just say ‚Äúin progress‚Äù which QuadPay explains is what it says when there‚Äôs a problem. You then have to cancel and confirm. The $250 was returned to full amount HOWEVER my bank account was charged the first payment. Under the impression I did something wrong, I tried again carefully following what I needed to do. Again ‚Äúin progress‚Äù, again it was cancelled and Again my bank account was charged. This App doesn‚Äôt appear to work well at all except when it comes to charging your own bank account. I wanted to discuss with someone but there is NO PHONE NUMBER for customer service. They will only chat with you and after sending several messages and trying to navigate their customer service-free site, I deleted it. I read several reviews after of people who are constantly being charged for orders that they were cancelled. Good Luck...there is no way to speak to ANYONE. Shawn

review: They give no info. I‚Äôve used Afterpay and Sezzle (and even Sezzle at bass pro for 6 month financing) for quite some time with no issue and thousand repaid. Quadpay in the original model never had stores I was interested in so perhaps that is why, I didn‚Äôt use them for a purchase through Ugg so cannot use them for a smallish purchase with their new system unlike how I could use Sezzle at bass pro no problemo. They will not disclose how they pick and choose which is obviously not credit based since they ask for zero info, no last 4 (Sezzle does for the 6 month financing), don‚Äôt even ask for bank or card info before denial (which I have enough flow to show easy repayment). I rate 1 star for lack of transparency here. Afterpay and sezzle let you start off small and increase unknown limits over time, which was no problem over the past year, I always am approved. I can drop 200$ and usually pay off early. The option for these types of services is quite nice when there is a sale and your check is due 2 weeks later anyways or you have an event/holiday/occasion requiring gift buying and are watching budgeting. Interest free and not using credit cards is also preferred. I‚Äôd request quadpay be more transparent on the denials, I‚Äôd reckon not having used prior to the change but since they aren‚Äôt an actual creditor they don‚Äôt seem to tell you why.
title: How do they approve?

title: Amazing

This is not a good look for their company and I have decided that I will NEVER USE THIS APP ANYMORE!!!!! APPLE, you need to be looking into reviews and investigating this APP too as you have other apps as of recently! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. Do not use this app, as they have a lack of customer service and they have a lack of resolutions. Not happy with this company at all. If I could leave 0 stars I would. One star rating is too much!
title: Sorry Service

review: (The only reason you see 5 star reviews is because as soon as you try and make a purchase they text or email to enter to win $150 if you leave a review and screen shot it) I seen this app and thought I‚Äôd check it out. Read all the great reviews. I tried it got approved to use 200 I used 90 through Walmart. They charged me the 25% of the order and charged my card. Then I got an email from Walmart stating they delayed my order for ‚Äúfinancial security‚Äù I then contacted QuadPay and they said they can process orders up to 7 days sometimes 13. We‚Äôll you should have made that know, maybe make that a clear statement before people make purchases. It‚Äôs been 4 days my purchase was still open and hadn‚Äôt changed to processing or in progress so I contacted them once again. They said Walmart denied the transaction and he just stopped all further installments and issued a refund for my 25% and should be in my bank in 5-10 business day or 13 calendar days. So then I contact Walmart and they said they didn‚Äôt deny it they accepted the order but the financial institution did not approve the transaction. So they take the money and then don‚Äôt approve the transaction and then when you follow up days later to find out what‚Äôs going on they barely say the transaction was denied and they‚Äôll start the refund now. No wonder your BBB rating is F.
title: BBB rating is an F for a reason!

developerResponse: {'id': 13720016, 'body': "We're so happy to hear that it all worked out! Keep on #QuadPaying", 'modified': '2020-02-26T15:43:51Z'}
review: I‚Äôve used QuadPay before when purchasing from affiliated merchants websites. I was a bit apprehensive since I wasn‚Äôt too sure how it worked when a return was made. I‚Äôm known to change my mind often. Well sure enough I needed to make a return and the whole process was super simple. I recently made another purchase using QuadPay which prompted me to see if there was an app available to better keep track of my payments and purchases. I was happy to see there was so I downloaded the app and to my surprise the app functions even better than expected. It allows you to not only make purchase from the merchant affiliates which are clearly displayed within the app, it provides a credit in which can be used when purchasing from any site. Most can be easily searched in the search field provided, but if for whatever reason you cannot instantly find the site you are searching, there is a google search function that allows you to find any website. Overall very practical and and super convenient. Great concept. Makes purchasing and repayment very easy.
title: Great App!!

review:
I got this app and wanted to us it on a merchant for an item I‚Äôd need for an event at the end of the year. Stock was limited but i didn‚Äôt have the money to pay to make sure I got my hands on it. While it was SUPER easy to sign up and I got an instant approval rate, the rest not so much. 
I went to the app to get my item. Hit ‚Äúpay with Quad‚Äù entered the total and got my payment schedule. Awesome! When I get ready to check out, the card numbers have already gone through. The app decides to refresh and there‚Äôs no longer the card numbers. But it never actually gave me numbers either. And Every time you order something you get a new ghost card. I tried to just re-do the order and go for it again. Incomplete because my first order with that merchant is ‚Äústill in progress‚Äù even though the stores checkout said otherwise. Then the app decided to charge my card FIVE times. And that trigger my bank to shut my account down for fraud. I contacted customer support when the app would also no longer accept my card even after the bank approved Quad to withdraw funds. Customer service is a JOKE. She told me to try it through different devices (laptop, tablet etc.) or a different search engine and private mode. Every time I asked to close the account I got no response. Upset, because I REALLY thought this would be THE app. Guess not ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
title: Not worth it

developerResponse: {'id': 17612533, 'body': 'Hey there! We are so sorry for the trouble. We would be happy to help with this. When you have a moment, please email us at appreviews@quadpay.com with any previous case numbers for reference. Looking forward to sorting this out!', 'modified': '2020-08-31T20:33:24Z'}
review: I downloaded quadpay to try it out, I previously read a review before that mentioned my current issue which I probably should have listened to. I‚Äôve used quad pay for almost 5 months now NO issues...until now one day out of the blue my virtual card disappears, error messages flying, or invalid virtual card pops up. Agent after agent has no idea why, one agent said ‚Äúyour card only appears when you make an purchase‚Äù which i was very clear i am still making a payment on items I purchased so thats way wrong. Then i was told my app wasn‚Äôt eligible and they were accepting accounts as they come like when you first sign up.. like WHAT? Im way mad by this point but was told ‚Äúoh! You can go on your computer and shop at stores that use quadpay and order that way.. just not through your mobile app‚Äù how does that make since?? At this point you are probably wasting your time having this app, or just enjoy the fun while it lasts. I loved using this app for the convince that I don‚Äôt shop but at maybe 1 store in quadpay and the rest i used a one time card.
title: Enjoy it while it lasts.

review: Where do I begin?  Well. My first time using QuadPay  on-line was so easy.  It tells you what to do.  First:  go shopping.  Browse the stores to find THAT pair of shoes, dress. Bedding, etc. then checkout with QuadPay.  Using the app is so simple and fast. When you have the total for your purchase, enter the total on the app and it will okay your purchase.  On your iPhone, it will say that you are using QuadPay.  When you enter the payment information, choose ‚Äúcredit card‚Äù and your QuadPay account information is entered for you and it finishes the transaction with the seller and then QuadPay splits the total into four two-week interval, payments. All is done on-line.  The first payment is due at purchase with the last three being set up to automatically be drawn from your bank at those given times.  QuadPay sends the total amount of your purchase to the seller, seller confirms the sale and you are done. You also have the balance owed showing on your QuadPay account.   So easy!   Thank you, QuadPay!  My life gust got easier!
title: I ‚Äòm so glad I found this app and QuadPay!

review: Let‚Äôs see.. I thought I made a 52$ purchase to test it out first the Order so called went through and took the first out of 4 payments out of my bank account here we are two days later I receive a text said that my 52$ was declined do to the card only had 25$ and I need to requested a new one..I did get another item as well but apparently every single time you make or want to make a purchase you have to put in how much your going to spend before you spend it like why can‚Äôt I just buy stuff and pay it back like all the other ones. Yet because the first order wasn‚Äôt shipped it didn‚Äôt ask me to create another virtual card it so much they don‚Äôt explain it‚Äôs to many circles to go around to use it. It says it will not take out what you do use yet it charged me and then said it was declined after wards I don‚Äôt like it!!! I only wanted to use QuadPay because the have better places to shop the Afterpay that‚Äôs why I gave two stars the process of this is to much of a run around  now I have to figure out how to get my money back do they even have a live customer service because last I Check u have to email them and wait for a email back which I done before and still never received a reply a month later. Don‚Äôt waste ur time!
title: Not happy at all!

review: Ok so I read about quad pay online. I applied and initially I was told I could not be approved and I should check back at another time. About 3 months later I randomly checked and I had a limit. So I put it to use. I made my first purchase on Fashionnova. It was so cool to pay for something  in bi weekly installments interest free. As I paid that installment off, my limit increased. I am on my fourth purchase and it has been a great help to not have to put out all my money at once. I recently made a purchase at Ikea instore. I tried using the quad pay apple pay but it declined and said I had to make a request in the app first. I did that step but then it showed me the card number to be typed in along with an exp date and CVV number. When I clicked on the apple pay button again which I assumed would then allow me to make the purchase it didnt work üòï. But the ikea rep allowed me to type my card info in on the  keypad so the purchase was complete. Please update the app to allow me to switch back over to apple pay once I make the request for my in-store purchase. The button is there but it does not work. Overall, a great app to use!
title: Easy cash flow

review: I have used quadpay several times online but wanted to try using it in the store so I looked at the website to see which retailers accepted quadpay in store and found that finish line did, I proceeded to the store and picked out the item I wanted to purchase and made sure I was allowed to spend the amount which was $100; I was pre approved for up to $300. I went to the cashier and showed them the card number that quadpay had given me since there was no internet in the store available to add the card to Apple Pay, the Finish Line associate said that quadpay was only to be used online and not in stores even though I could show them on the app that it was eligible for in store use at finish line. Needless to say it was a failed transaction, I left upset. Maybe there needs to be some communication between quadpay and retailers and also there needs to be availability to download to Apple Pay prior to having to enter and amount so the download can occur before actually going in store because most retailers have sucky internet capabilities so download isn‚Äôt possible in store.
title: Easy to use online but the store is a different story

developerResponse: {'id': 18623017, 'body': "We are so sorry for the issues you're experiencing. We would be happy to step in and help out. When you have a moment, please email us at appreviews@quadpay.com with any previous case numbers for reference. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-10-21T16:52:30Z'}
review: Afterpay is a better app to use. I didn‚Äôt have a great experience with this app. When I first created my account they never gave me a balance just a blank app asking me to check back later for a balance. Once I received my balance I made a few purchases from Walmart and another website. I made all my payments on time. I needed to update my payment information. Once I updated my payment information my account was immediately restricted without any good reasons. I contacted customer service before and after I updated my payment information but they didn‚Äôt respond back in a timely manner. A few days later I receive an email saying that they couldn‚Äôt verify my purchase or me as the user. My first time using this app was full of crap. The slightest purchase from anyplace can get your account restricted fast. All my payments were on time and paid in full!!! I‚Äôve requested for my account to be deleted from their platform but apparently there is a waiting list for that to lol smh. This app is kind of iffy if I can‚Äôt delete my account that I can no longer use. I usually read reviews but quadpay popped up as a payment option right along with Afterpay from a different website. I should‚Äôve just used Afterpay and I would have no issues.
title: They will restrict your account for any reason

review: So I shop on fashion nova and saw quad pay on the site. I was skeptical about QuadPay worried it was like rent a cent or other agency that charge a high interest rate, but the don‚Äôt. I was able to make my purchase and the payments were split into 4 payments, my items were shipped to me. I then downloaded the app where I was able to make my payments and add another card for payments. I do wish they allowed you to put extra money towards your purchase, like my four payments were 75 dollars, I wanted to put an extra 10-20 dollars but was only able to pay the due amount. After I finished paying off my purchase I had available balance that I was able to use for future purchases and I tried that out on the app. You go on to the quad pay app shop, the stores that accept quad pay are on there. You find the store you want shop online through the app and at checkout you can choose to use quad pay. Also you can get your items that day if you choose store pickup. I found my new best app and I‚Äôm telling everyone.
title: Love love love

developerResponse: {'id': 20934903, 'body': 'Hi there! Thanks for letting us know what happened. Please feel free to send us an email at appreviews@quadpay.com with your previous case number for reference. From there, we can take a closer look and resolve this for you. review:
I thought that I would love QuadPay but nope. I got a one time use virtual card and honestly forgot that it was a one time use card. I know my mistake, i used it for a 71 cent purchase just to make sure all was ok. Me totally forgetting the one time use tried to use it again and of course it was declined. I called customer service to inform them of my mistake so I can make the purchase for the balance that I had but they put a hold on my card and of course charged my account the whole 26$ fee. Which would have been fine if I used the amount that I requested from QuadPay. After several calls and emails, no results not even another virtual card so I could make another purchase since I never used the amount that was allotted to me. They got a payment and I got nothing. I will continue to call and email until things are straightened out. Customer service didn‚Äôt know how to help and kept telling me to use the virtual card and I tried to tell them that it was a one time use card and I would need another card to proceed. She didn‚Äôt get what I was saying. So while I appreciate the 4 split payments. It shouldn‚Äôt be that hard to refund a customer‚Äôs money especially when only 71 cent was used out of 100$. Someone please help. 
Melissa
title: Unprofessional

review: Ok I gave a little time to learn the structure of this new app before writing my review. I loveeeeeee QuadPay. This is the first time I can literally say an app saves my life. There‚Äôs things I want but can‚Äôt get because I don‚Äôt have traditional direct deposit, and/or I have multiple cards and it‚Äôs just too complicated to just purchase things the traditional way. It‚Äôs so transparent! The interface is easy and user-friendly, the least tech savvy person could figure this out. The money comes out when they say it will, how much they say it will, the method they say it will. You always know what to expect. I have yet to learn the dynamics of a return using QuadPay (ie, purchasing a product from eBay, receiving it, then sending it back for a refund) but I mostly use the app to pay my phone bill or buy things for my kiddos! I love you QuadPay. I can breathe easy knowing if a card declines and I‚Äôm already at the register (can‚Äôt get to atm) I can just pop out QuadPay from my Apple Pay wallet and I‚Äôm good! BOOm Pay it back later.
title: THIS APP IS AMAZAINNNNN

developerResponse: {'id': 14343636, 'body': "We are so sorry for the issues you're experiencing. We would be happy to step in and help out. When you have a moment, please email us at appreviews@quadpay.com with any previous case numbers for reference. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-03-30T19:52:39Z'}
review: I started using quad pay December of 2019 when I brought Ugg‚Äôs for my girls. When I checked out and seen that option I said to myself why not. The Ugg‚Äôs arrived quick, and then I received a notification to download the quad pay app. I downloaded it, and received a message about waiting for approval because there was a waitlist. Then when my linked to the Ugg‚Äôs I just brought, and made my first installment I became eligible. I started making purchases, and I was in love with this app. I always paid earlier than the due date, and never missed a payment. Within the last few weeks I noticed that my available credit kept decreasing, and I haven‚Äôt been making any purchases. Of course they only have contact through email and live chat so it‚Äôs hard describing what the issue is with someone over a chat option verses speaking with someone over the phone. When I spoke with someone they stated that there has been an issue with multiple accounts decreasing the available credit, and their techs are working on it. This is week 4, and still no reply and my available credit is not where it is supposed to be. I use to love Quad Pay, but this really turning me away.
title: Use to love the app

developerResponse: {'id': 19250168, 'body': "We are so sorry for the issues you're experiencing. We would be happy to step in and help out. When you have a moment, please email us at appreviews@quadpay.com with any previous case numbers for reference. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-11-20T17:26:33Z'}
review: I have actually had this app for around 3 months. My first purchase got denied when I tried to use it. It was not the money. I just paid in full.  I wanted to see how well it worked. I wrote 3 emails to QuadPay. After the 3rd the response was ‚Äúplease review the support section. ‚Äú I gave it some time 3 months lol. I actually forgot I had it. You don‚Äôt have a physical card. Only cards similar to ‚Äúon line gift cards‚Äù who‚Äôs numbers switch each time. I guess. I called to ask them about that. As you can imagine the phone message was ‚Äúdue to a high call volume  we cannot take your call, please try back later‚Äù.  I finally got it to work and tried to order something online. It worked to perfection! I don‚Äôt know why all of sudden it worked? I did nothing after the 3rd email lol. I went to use it again. Denied lol. So...here we are. Honestly it‚Äôs a terrific idea! The game plan this company is wildly awesome! However, for me I am just going to let it grow as a company and come back to see if the customer service is fixed. Because, if I spend $500-$1000 or even $300 and something goes wrong...YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SPEAK TO ANYONE! I personally cannot deal with a place with NO customer service.
title: Great concept needs TLC.

review: I‚Äôm a new mom/young adult and currently in graduate school, let me tell youuuuu this app makes its so much easier to pay for things. No scam and no interest. At first, I was skeptical about it whenever I had seen it on Fashionnova but then I though ‚Äúhmm let me give it a try‚Äù on this website called Painted Memory since I wanted to purchase something off their website for a sip and paint at home with my fianc√©. Made it easier for me to purchase the item, no interest included, just broke it down for me in 4 installments. That easy! Also, i was surprised that the app gives an available balance too so if I don‚Äôt have the money they help you to purchase w.e you want at w.e website/store you use. Just tell them how much you‚Äôre expecting to pay and then boom they easily give you a quadpay card information to use and separate your purchase into 4 installments to pay back. Was able to purchase my fianc√© a valentines gift I‚Äôve been wanting to get him. Great app I‚Äôve ever used!! Love it!!
title: Best app ever used!!

review:
The fact that you can use this anywhere is awesome! It‚Äôs not as easy to use the first time but once you get the hang of it i can see me using this often, especially with Christmas coming up.
 I only have 2 cons but after you make these mistakes you won‚Äôt make them again. First, this is better used on internet and not in stores. I had a devil of a time trying to make this work at a store til I finally just gave up. Second, you gotta know what you‚Äôre going to spend first so go through the motions all the way til tax and delivery THEN go back into the QuadPay app to start the process so you won‚Äôt mess the ‚Äúmoney‚Äù up. I made a purchase and was done but the product was taken back (no fault of QP) so my whole purchase ended up being less than my first installment payment. It takes quite a few days but it did adjust itself so don‚Äôt get in a tizzy...it don‚Äôt matter if you do because there isn‚Äôt a way to call anybody for help anyways. Lol. Other than those I will be using it and have already recommended it to my friends.
title: Darn Near Perfection

review:
Hi, hello! So I‚Äôm changing up my review because I felt that it didn‚Äôt give this app enough justice. Let‚Äôs get this out of the way‚ÄîI. LOVE this app‚Äî okay, now for ‚Äòwhy‚Äô:
      I‚Äôm a huge collector of figures from scales to non-scaled, preprinted and ones with articulated joints, and let me tell you, this app has saved me in terms of credit debt! I used to charge up credit cards like no tomorrow, and then I happened to stumble upon this app and I am a changed woman. I‚Äôve bought Christmas presents, birthday presents, made a large purchase of $350 seem like a lay-up to pay off, because of the four payments that it divides into. As a hardcore collector, you have no idea how ecstatic I am to have found such a simple and pleasant and easy to use app! I recommended it to all my friends and family because it‚Äôs just perfect. Please change nothing with this app, it‚Äôs amazing the way it is! That‚Äôs all for my review, I hope I didn‚Äôt sound too much of fan-girl, anyway, thanks for the read, and happy new year!
title: My Favorite App

developerResponse: {'id': 14218019, 'body': "We're so glad we can be here for you! Thank you for the thoughtful review and keep on #QuadPaying üòä", 'modified': '2020-03-24T14:51:59Z'}
review: The service that I received although it was by chat was excellent.  The app itself needs tweaking as the situation I had when buying the item did not go as planned. I had requested a lower amount by 10 cents. I needed to request just a bit more obviously and it was not intuitive as I had expected. I use another similar app with another organization and it is very easy to re-request a different amount with their app. I had to drill down to different screens to find the cancel card button with QuadPay. Another issue is that a hold is placed on the pay account for the first payment before the requested amount can be used. That was the only reason I had to call in to have the hold removed so I can start over again. I believe that QuadPay is excellent and their fee is absolutely fair for this offer of convenience!!! I like QuadPay and have referred the service to others.  The greatest aspect of QUADPAY is that you can use it at any I mean ANY online store!!
title: Exceptional Customer Service

review:
I downloaded QuadPay when I first realized it was an option to pay with on Fur‚Äôs website. It really piqued my interest so I gave it a shot. I instantly got approved for $200 and everything processed so so quickly! I was able to easily pay it off and even purchased Nike‚Äôs last week, I already received them! I‚Äôve been super happy with the great service so far and I love how quickly everything is processed! 

With this being said, I haven‚Äôt tried using it in person yet. I‚Äôve seen a couple of others having issues with in-person encounters or one off ‚Äúbad experiences‚Äù. My advice for anyone considering getting this app: do it!! you have nothing to lose and it‚Äôs honestly so nice to have another sort of paying option without having to worry about applying for a credit card. Just keep in mind that this is a fairly new app so glitches and bugs happen!! it can only get better from here honestly (and it‚Äôs already pretty great).
title: Simple and Effective

review:
I‚Äôve used the app once ‚Äî in store. I misunderstood how to use it, probably because the common questions and answers weren‚Äôt available on the app. I recommend going to the actual website and reading all the information so you‚Äôre not stuck at a register with angry people behind you waiting for you to figure out your payment. You have to make a new request, even if you didn‚Äôt use the full amount you agreed to spend/pay back. Example: I requested $150, agreed to $31 over four payments, it preauthed $31 to my debit, but I only spent $87...my mistake was thinking the rest of the amount I didn‚Äôt spend ($63) was still readily available to use...NOPE! And that amount will not fall off preauth and available on Quadpay until days later. HMPH.

Know exactly what you want to spend before you request because you can only have three open orders at a time. All in all, genius app! The flexibility of four payments is sweet! Just gotta figure out the kinks and how to clear what is actually spend a lot sooner than 2-3 days later.
title: Pretty genius idea but flawed.

review:
Love it!!
Thought I would share some tips on using QuadPay:
1. Use a bill budget app that lets you see your bills for the next 60days. You need to make sure you can afford the payments ahead of time. I like to use the app Prism! It‚Äôs FREE and it can link to bill companies and banks. FREE. If you don‚Äôt want to link your bank, use the payday feature and set your future min. Pay that you get weekly, bi weekly, or monthly.
2. Don‚Äôt use QuadPay for something you might cancel because of size issues like Clothes, shoes,etc. i see a lot of people complain about refund issue. Buy what you already know you will keep. With hopes that nothing is broken or damaged of course.
3. Talking about refunds- When using instore method, WAIT UNTIL YOU KNOW EXACTLY HOW MUCH YOU ARE USING TO REQUEST FUNDS FROM QUADPAY, basically when the cashier tells you your total. Round to nearest dollar or exact amount. So what if people are waiting behind you.
4. If you might struggle paying (4) $80 payments for next 2 months then don‚Äôt use $320+.Avoid crazy late fees.
5. I use QuadPay for things I need and do it in one transaction. Thank God I was able to get my family Christmas gifts! I wasn‚Äôt able to drop $$$ at the time. I was able to manage the payments.
I don‚Äôt recommend using it for crazy shopping, only what you need and emergency. 
Remember, this is better than a CC or a small loan, no interest! 
But, I FREAKING LOVE QUADPAY!
Yes, poor customer service tho!plz Fix that ASAP :)
title: Quick tips/ used it 4x now

review:
No I‚Äôm not broke or i can‚Äôt afford it. I just helps alot that I don‚Äôt have to pay all at once. That way I‚Äôm able to spin a little bit of my money on other things instead of waiting on my next paycheck. I always make my purchases on pay day that way I know the money is always in my account. Like what more could you really ask for someone is willing to pay full price for you just so you could pay it back in 4 payments with no interest!!!

The only issue I recently came across is that I tried to purchase 3 pairs of sneakers online from Footlocker. One pair of the shoes was coming from a different store so i was receiving it as a separate order. When footlocker tried to process my second order it was decline because QuadPay didn't realize it was from my original purchase request for Footlocker. Because of that I lost out on free shipping and a discount on my purchase.

But I still love the app and will continue to use it
title: Love it!!! Best idea ever, easy to use!!!!

review: Although you may not pay interest, QP charges an additional amount within your purchase total, causing the total paid to be more than just the amount of the item + taxes. Although it may be interest fee, this added amount is not disclosed anywhere as a notice until you‚Äôre about to checkout. This is crazy. The purpose of using this should be convenience. Although I understand it‚Äôs a help to those who may have credit issues and need some help with big(ger) purchases, however, that is not the case for everyone. Especially not with other services that do the same thing and don‚Äôt charge fees. I only thought to use QP of the others I have because it was displayed on the merchants site. But after see this added amount for the 2nd time in trying to use, I‚Äôve just decided to never use it now. Missed out on an item I wanted because I chose to find another method of payment after seeing what QP was going to try to charge me. Overall, nothing necessarily wrong with the service, but for those like me, if I‚Äôm going to pay more than retail, I might as well buy the item 2nd hand, pay out of pocket or just use my other available services.
title: Interest free, with a catch

developerResponse: {'id': 14420537, 'body': "Hi Renee, Thank you for reaching out and being a fan! We would love to help you with this. When you have a moment, please shoot us an email at appreviews@quadpay.com and we'll give you some helpful tips for next time!", 'modified': '2020-04-02T19:00:38Z'}
review: Honestly I like the QuadPay app and I like the fact that you get money to spend I used the spending amount that I had to make a purchase at fashion nova and first problem is that it‚Äôs extremely slow and lagging and second I‚Äôm not sure why when I payed using QuadPay spending money it still broke it up into four payments and charged both my bank card for the first installment and took the money from my virtual Visa card if I had enough money on my virtual card to complete the full purchase then why break it up into four payments and charge the first installment to my bank card that doesn‚Äôt make since and what‚Äôs the point of a spending limit and virtual Visa card? Also the help section wasn‚Äôt very helpful in explaining this and I feel like y‚Äôall should give us the option of calling customer service to speak with someone directly instead of trying to figured it out on our own with a bunch of questions other than that I guess the app is okay but I probably won‚Äôt be using the virtual visa with the spending money on it anymore because really what‚Äôs the point?
title: Decent

developerResponse: {'id': 12793316, 'body': "Hi there! We're not always able to approve every customer but want to make the process to sign up as quick and seamless as possible. Please feel free to email appreviews@quadpay.com with any additional comments or questions!", 'modified': '2020-01-08T11:32:27Z'}
review:

I don‚Äôt mind lying but they could of told consumers up front the fee will be charged.. other than that I like the carotid stores and quick and easy to use unlike Klarna who keeps saying ‚Äúyou can not use this card at this store‚ÄùKlarna has if you shop at a store to often, you no longer can shop there.. don‚Äôt know why ..

My funds were almost gone been stretched for out to the fullest. Decided to check Walmart out on for some Black Friday deals bc QuadPay sent a email read it said IN-STORE so I went. review: I was making a purchase online at Lane Bryant.  It was $100 and the other service I was using wasn‚Äôt working.  So I decided to try QuadPay as I used it in the past for at Ugg.  Well this time I‚Äôm going through and it says if I want to use this service that you all charge an extra $4.  No reason why just if I want to shop at LB it‚Äôs $4 extra dollars.  So I said ok and confirmed my order.  While yes this service is a convince I think consumers deserve to know why for that store it cost extra money and two when I purchased items from Ugg there was no service fee.  Others like Sezzle, Afterpay and Klarna do not charge fees for the same store.  I did try them but it was a tech issue and time was pressed.  I use services like these to limit inputting my card information on multiple sites.  Then I pay them off quickly.  If there is an extra fee though it should be consistent with why it it‚Äôs being charged and stated why so consumers understand upfront.  I will not be recommending this service to anyone as fees without explanation is not ok for me.
title: It‚Äôs ok but will delete once done

review: This App is awesome I have never heard of it until my sister told me about it. All you need is a phone number to get started, some personal info and a debit/credit card to pay back purchases.  I love the fact that items can be purchased by paying a reasonable small down payment (due at time of purchase from your debit card/ credit card) then the remainder is broken into 4 payments to pay over the next 6 weeks and Quad pays the remainder balance (with a virtual card that you copy into payment info section) for the item at time of purchase.  There is zero interest. You will receive an initial balance mine was $300 these balances vary I‚Äôm not sure what Info is used to determine the balance you will receive. Once balances are paid off your balance goes back up with each payment you make and you can make as many purchases as you want as long as you have have enough in your balance to cover purchases.

review: I‚Äôll start by saying I‚Äôve used similar ‚Äòpay in 4‚Äô apps and I‚Äôll use those as my comparison. The cons are that the virtual card pops up at the bottom of the checkout cart and it is so small that if you‚Äôre not looking for it you‚Äôll miss it. The virtual card numbers don‚Äôt auto fill correctly into the card spot when you‚Äôre checking out which is a hassle in itself. I had to cancel my first virtual card and restart my whole purchase because I left my cart during the checkout process and my virtual card disappeared. Quadpay is also the first ‚Äòpay in 4‚Äô app that‚Äôs charged me a fee for using their service (it was a small fee but still) the other two apps do not charge any fees to the customer that I‚Äôm aware of. Other than that it was pretty simple and straightforward. I am curious as to how the refund process works and how long it takes. I also think it would be a good idea to make a ‚Äòreturn‚Äô button available so that your payments are stopped while your return is in process.

review: Easy to say the app shares some of the core functions of other apps out there on the market. What makes this app different is it‚Äôs ability to simplify UI and manage scheduling of your payments via a calendar app. Apple wallet access is also a great feature for in-store purchasing. The app isn‚Äôt all glitz and glam and that‚Äôs ok :). It focuses on getting you setup and on your way to having access to flexible payments with some great merchants. I first used mine at Kelty and when you are buying a tent, sleeping bag and pad I opted for this verses putting on borrowed credit from a credit card. You can live within your means and not have the added stress of a credit card balance. For many they won‚Äôt care or even blink and say that‚Äôs what credit cards are for; I‚Äôd say different. End of the day, we all will go about our own choices. For someone who doesn‚Äôt like using credit cards except for actual emergencies this is a great option.
title: Punchy and Simple

review:

I was hoping though other people would jump On this band wagon.  It was just me as a visionary would hoped to see.  I stumbled upon QuadPay and again it was exactly what I was looking for.  They had such a wide range of retailers and I was not forced to get my credit checked or purchase a credit card.  I like the ear of using my phone and even of the retailer does say pay with Quadpay, you can pop over to the app with ease and see what retailers you can use QuadPay with.  It‚Äôs really neat and so simple, like set up an apple product simple.  They take the hard work of applying for a credit card out with the luxury of using your own Debit card.  The money is taken out automatically every two weeks.  I am
Glad I stumbled upon this awesome app!

Well it‚Äôs been more than 24 hours and i‚Äôve yet to get any response. review: I love this app because it helps me get what I want without having to worry if I have enough money in the account. You pay the cost of the item(s) split up in four payments! And they aren‚Äôt due until every two weeks! You can use it anywhere! I‚Äôve used it on fashion nova which had an option to use quad pay. I loved it! Then the other day I was wishing it was available for Victoria‚Äôs Secret but figured it wasn‚Äôt an option BUT on the quad pay app, it says you can use it anywhere in store or online and Victoria‚Äôs Secret was an option! You click on the store that you want to use it on and you order as normal and then choose pay with quad pay and at checkout it gives you a number to put in the card information at checkout! This has to be one of the best if not the best app out there! You can literally use it anywhere! Download it! And you‚Äôll love it! Especially with Christmas coming up, this is definitely a life saver!
title: BEST APP EVER!

review: I am beyond ecstatic for stumbling across this app!!! After getting declined for multiple credit cards I began using Afterpay but I was limited to very few stores so, I went on the hunt for a ‚Äúbuy now, pay later‚Äù app/company that I could use ANYWHERE!! And boy did I find the best!! With this app you‚Äôre able to put a virtual card on ApplePay! So anywhere that accepts ApplePay you can shop at! And if your shopping online or don‚Äôt have an iPhone it‚Äôs still super simple to use! Just shop within the app, add to cart and select ‚Äúpay with Quadpay‚Äù at the bottom of your screen!! They give you a virtual card to use online for that purchase! Payments are automatically taken out every 2 weeks after that or you can pay some early! I‚Äôve already made multiple purchases with this app! Only thing is I wish they‚Äôd report to credit bureaus üò¢ I‚Äôm trying to raise my credit scoreü§£ but I understand why they don‚Äôt and that‚Äôs ok too!
title: BEST APP EVER!!!!

review: I actually really got addicted to using this app because it‚Äôs so convenient for my budget. I really needed a new wardrobe for the next school year but was tight on money to buy them all upfront, however QuadPay made it SOO easy for me to afford it. It lets you split the amount into 4 separate payments, and if you are on a biweekly paycheck like me, that‚Äôs perfect timing for each of my paychecks. I don‚Äôt have to worry about where the money‚Äôs coming from or how much it‚Äôs going to hurt me that paycheck because it‚Äôs a small amount of money from each check. Also unlike other buy now pay later apps, it has a search online feature where you can look up any store you could ever think of that takes Visa and it‚Äôll work for it. They basically give you a special debit card number to use on the check out, which is totally dope! Anyways QuadPay has been fantastic so far and I‚Äôm afraid I‚Äôm already addicted to using it. Try it!
title: Addicting!!! I love it!

developerResponse: {'id': 13946056, 'body': "Thank you for reaching out and being a fan! When you have a moment, please shoot us an email at appreviews@quadpay.com and we'll give you some helpful tips for next time!", 'modified': '2020-03-09T17:47:15Z'}
review:
QuadPay is great for purchases that are just a little bit beyond what you want to spend at one time. 

The service allows you to browse online storefronts within the app, which is incredibly convenient. The storefront browser is a bit rough however, and I found myself repeatedly returned to the homepage of the store I was perusing. I would recommend finding your desired purchase in a dedicated web browser, then locating them in the QuadPay browser to save some time. This is a very minor gripe, and the app is still fresh so the browser will no doubt improve over time.

The primary function of the app works perfectly. The process of breaking large payments up into four smaller ones might be a bit confusing at first, but the app helps you every step of the way. I haven‚Äôt used similar apps, but thanks to how easy to use this one was I have no reason to. I highly recommend the service and will be using it again in the not too distant future.
title: Layaway in the 21st Century

review: I recently downloaded this app and have used it twice already. I‚Äôve tried another app similar to this one and they didn‚Äôt charge a $1 convenience fee like quadpay did, so that‚Äôs a little downfall for me but not a huge deal just comparing to the other app. What I can say is how great it is to find the retailers in the app and you can just shop around in the app and they just let you copy and paste the temporary card number they give you, so thats great. Its like a credit card without all the other extra fees and interests and its better than worrying about late fees or forgetting to pay off your card because as long as your card has funds they deduct it on their own so you pay off faster. I didn‚Äôt get approved for much, but it did come in clutch for me to be able to buy what I wanted to at the time without having to break the bank with the total amount. I will be using this app again for sure.
title: Very convenient

We‚Äôll be inviting people to try it over the next few months‚Äù. But after a little research in their question section, I discovered that QP waitlists people downloading the app! review: I used QuadPay directly on the merchants account. I had never used it before that having been my first time. When I saw the option, I followed and was approved. The second and third installments were taken out of my account on time. With the final installment still pending for more than another week, I revisited the same merchant as before to make another purchase. I was denied. I added another payment card. I was still denied. Both accounts have more that enough money to cover the full purchase yet I was still denied time and time again. Thinking that due to my last installment being unpaid, I was being denied. So, I paid the final installment over a week early yet I was still denied when I tried to make a new purchase. I then downloaded the app. I cannot shop directly from the app. I suppose this is what they call ‚Äúwaitlisted‚Äù. It seems to me like this is a one and done type of thing. There is no consistency, no information and no satisfaction. I don‚Äôt how any customer retentions accomplished. It must not be one of this company‚Äôs values. review: I have been using QuadPay for quite some time now and initially I thought it was a great company until I had to be refunded for an item. I was thinking of making another purchase and thought I‚Äôd check the latest reviews to see if everyone was still happy with their experience here. review: I downloaded this app as sort of a fluke really, someone else had mentioned QuadPay in a review for a DIFFERENT app so I thought I would see what it was. I am really glad I did! Allows you to shop basically anywhere, online OR in a store, get your purchase immediately and then pay for it in 4 installments over 6 weeks with the first payment due at the time of purchase. I made my first purchase online, but I really love that you can shop in a store and use QuadPay! The app is extremely easy to use, you do not have to do any sort of application or forms. It will give you an amount that you have available to spend, you just request the amount you need for each purchase and it tells you the installment amounts and due dates. Great alternative to credit cards as there is no interest and no credit application. I love it!
title: Fast, easy and amazingly convenient!

review: This is one of the most awesome things out there as of today‚Äôs modern...... didn‚Äôt discover this till I made a purchase at GLAMNETIC which gave me the option to use QuadPay, me being interested in the fact that I didn‚Äôt have to fully pay for my purchase only a 1/4 of it and had 6 weeks to pay (broken down in 3 installments) not only that the best part about the whole thing honestly, IS THERE IS NO INTEREST!!!! I know it sounds fishy, cause now a days there‚Äôs no such thing as paying too much or being over charged... even our banks charge us to use and spend our own money now that‚Äôs bizarre right. But no gimmicks about the no interest no hidden fees or charges unless you miss a scheduled payment. But you should try it I started using this option and I‚Äôm starting to use it more and opt out my credit cards because I like paying no interest. So give it a go.
title: The new CC w/o the interest

review: Absolutely love using QuadPay especially for things I want to splurge on or have been eyeing for a while, but haven‚Äôt taken the plunge. I needed new skincare and didn‚Äôt want to pay a hefty price tag for it all at once. QuadPay made it so easy because it breaks the total into four payments and aligns with most paydays (semi monthly / biweekly). I would love if, as customers show they are responsible users who pay off their balances, they would offer to extend payment dates and/or offer a monthly payback option rather than every two weeks. Having the choice would be great. I also love that this is an alternative to a typical credit card. Oh and the card feature actually works - I was given a spending amount, and added the card to my Apple wallet. I can use it anywhere, as long as I indicate how much I‚Äôm spending beforehand. I can‚Äôt rave enough about QuadPay, love their product!!
title: You‚Äôll love this app!

I hope to get granted more spending limit to use on bigger purchases it would absolutely help me afford more things for example if you could use this app at an apple store it would help tremendously to be able to buy a MacBook Pro for school I mean that would be incredible I hope you‚Äôll consider in the near future apple and increasing my spending limit it would help a lot absolutely so far love this app it‚Äôs not like anything I‚Äôve ever used and it‚Äôs helped me purchase things easier and not have to spend all up front with no hassles I‚Äôll keep using this app as long as it adds more benefits and apple and more spending limit as well as just being helpful! review:
I‚Äôve made 2 orders so far so I‚Äôm still new and while nervous at first I‚Äôm liking it. The biggest things i like is:

‚Ä¢ it‚Äôs easy, you can use in store or online (in store orders can be saved to Apple Pay/wallet).
‚Ä¢ your using a QuadPay card instead of your on so then your not using your own card online and in store.
‚Ä¢ and the total of your purchase is spilt into 4 bi-weekly payments with no high interest or fees I believe it‚Äôs a $1.50 charge on the 4 payments. 

At the time I can‚Äôt really give 5 stars yet but will return and change it if it keeps going well.
‚Äî‚Äî
a little story: I had a bit of anxiety after my 2nd order because I did it a bit weird. Basically, the QuadPay app wasn‚Äôt showing me the promo prices I saw on an email for an online store using their browser on the app so I went through with the purchase on QuadPay but was trying to do it as an in store purchase so I could just get the QuadPay card info and pay through the stores email link I had to get the promo prices. Honestly, this app is pretty darn cool so far!!

review: I‚Äôve always been a fan of quadpay and I think it‚Äôs a really good idea they made an app, however, I downloaded it for the first time yesterday and tried to make a quadpay purchase and it was declined because I did not write the correct amount of the purchase. I typed in the item price because I knew it was going to be more expensive with shipping/tax/etc but I find it a little odd that they didn‚Äôt just create the app to automatically pick up on those details. Anyways, my purchase went through and then I got an email saying it was declined because I entered the wrong amount so I tried it again, this time with the correct amount, and about 3 hours later it was declined again and there was no reason. Quadpay gives you a ‚Äúcredit card‚Äù to use so I don‚Äôt know what was going on there. I just gave up, deleted the app, and purchased them at full price on the actual website, without using quadpay. My final words, I do not like the app, however I do like using quadpay while shopping on websites that provide it!
title: Ehh...

review:
At first, I was very pleased with this app. Compared to Sezzle and AfterPay, you can use QuadPay practically anywhere.

I have made several purchases with the app without any issue, but lately I have been unable to complete any remaining payments on my purchases and only receive ‚ÄúAn error has occurred‚Äù‚Ä¶ very non-descript. I figured it was a card issue, so I added a new card (which took a few tries to propagate). After achieving this I tried to delete the old card. Nothing. No UI response indicating any success or failure. The card remains in the list. Even worse? Trying to pay off any remaining balance with the new card also fails with the same ‚ÄúAn error has occurred‚Äù message. It‚Äôs not just the app, but the website as well.

I have attempted to reach out to the team via Intercom on their website. Response time: Several hours. It said I‚Äôll be notified by email once they respond. That never happened. Could I try again? Yes. Likelihood of the team responding? I perceive it to be narrow. I‚Äôm just about done with this app.
title: Payment System Non-Functional

review: I downloaded this app after hearing about it through fashion nova. I was very excited to try it since I had found a dress on fashion nova that I wanted to buy for my school‚Äôs upcoming ball and thought that this would be a good way to do it since I am not able to pay it in full for the time being. I downloaded the app and entered in all of my information and then waited for the information to be processed. To my disappointment I was ‚Äònot approved‚Äô for some strange reason. I wonder if it‚Äôs due to my account balance atm, but even still how am I able to know what meets the requirements if the app doesn‚Äôt state it in the beginning? I‚Äôm just really upset right now bc I really need this dress for my ball that‚Äôs on the 14th of this month and I thought this would help me pay for it. I‚Äôm a struggling college student and I‚Äôm trying my best but I am disappointed with the system of this app and the overall layout. There has to be a more efficient way to differentiate scammers and ACTUAL costumers. There also needs to be a set of guidelines laid out for people so they can know what to expect instead of being misleading.
title: MISLEADING don‚Äôt waste your time

review: I didn‚Äôt know anything about this app until I seen something on Fashion Nova that I just had to have and as I was checking out I seen they over a payment plan through QuadPay. So I googled it and found there was an app. I downloaded the app and put all my information and it instantly gave me a $200 balance. I wish I could have gotten approved for more but it‚Äôs a start hopefully when I pay off my balance I will get approved for more. On the app it offers many stores you can type in the search engine for what you are looking for and if it‚Äôs not on there it will take you right to google to purchase the item. The way you do that is with the card number they give you with the amount you told the app you were about to spend. I love it I‚Äôm gonna keep using it to see what else I can purchase without having to break my pockets all at once.
title: Loving it so far

review: QuadPay is great and easy to use. You can search most any store right from their app and have the option to use QuadPay as payment up to your spending limit. You just make 4 easy payments for your purchase. 1st payment due is at the time of purchase and the other 3 are due every 2 weeks until your purchase is paid off. You don‚Äôt have WAIT for your purchase, it is shipped out right after the first payment that is due at check out. At check out you choose QuadPay, enter your total purchase, the app then builds a temporary credit card for you to use for your total purchase to the merchant, QuadPay then debits the first of the four payments at that time from your account and the remaining 3 payments are just as easy, they are auto debited right from your bank account in 2 week increments. Used it, loved it, will use again!!
title: Great!! Easy to use!!

review: So far I live quadpay.  When you sign up you are immediately shown your credit limit.  This way I know how much I have avail to spend.  I‚Äôm not sure why Klarna and Afterpay do not do this. review: I really wish the debit is immediately withdrawn when you make your purchase and not so much time is spaced between purchase and confirmation. My money is hung up and some purchases declined like this, and it isn‚Äôt an immediate notification, it‚Äôs hours later while I‚Äôm thinking the whole time my order was successful. I would not recommend this from an account that is frequently debited and active. Use an account that is bankrolled‚Ä¶.after all, the people who will mainly use this are people on a budget or can‚Äôt afford just to buy in full, and it should be made more convenient.
